code:
sequenceDiagram
    participant Client
    participant Interceptor
    participant Admission
    participant Execution
    participant Supervisor
    participant Handler
    participant ServerStream
    participant Lifecycle

    Client->>Interceptor: Start server-stream RPC
    Interceptor->>Admission: Admit execution
    Admission-->>Interceptor: allow

    Interceptor->>Execution: Execute(ctx)
    Execution->>Supervisor: Run(handler)
    Supervisor->>Handler: Invoke handler(execCtx, stream)

    loop Server streaming
        Handler->>ServerStream: SendMsg(message)
        ServerStream-->>Client: message
    end

    opt Client cancels
        Client-->>Execution: Context canceled
    end

    opt Server shutdown
        Lifecycle-->>Execution: Shutdown signal
    end

    Supervisor-->>Execution: Result
    Execution-->>Interceptor: Result
    Interceptor-->>Client: Stream closed
repo_description: Grip is a Go library for building panic-safe, ordered, and backpressure-aware streaming systems with strict lifecycle guarantees.
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
